Name: Double Vision
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of 2 skewered blackcurrants (use half a wooden cocktail stick).
Garnish with skewered berries in rim.
Review: Citrus fresh with apple, red berries and faint floral notes.
Nutrition: One serving of Double Vision contains 110 calories
